name: RX_INVENTORY_LOC
description: This table stores Inventory Location (IVL) records.

columns.name: INVENTORY_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for this inventory location.

columns.name: INVENTORY_LOC_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Stores the inventory location record name.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Stores the inventory location record name.
